attributes.additional_details:
The privatisation-franchise system has led to higher prices and lower service and reliability for the UK public. It has therefore failed. 

Alternative systems in other countries such as Deutsche Bahn in Germany offer a better service for a fraction of the price. We should be able to at least replicate that.

Reliable transport is key to a prosperous economy. The time savings can lead to huge improvements in productivity. Its a no-brainer.
attributes.background: Nationalise all UK railways and match the German level of price and quality

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622782
